snippet.title: The Lost: First Impressions-RPGMaker MV
snippet.description:
Download the game: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/jmzo60nb4qie9z6/AADu8pmoKIHD2_KH65pl44r0a?dl=0

Hello my croutons and welcome to another first impressions video! Today we take a look at The Lost by DutchPowerCreations!

Pros:
Great Mapping
Great Art
Challenging Battle System
Great Music

Cons:
Blood tiles are ever so slightly square.

This game is really amazing! It has some super fun battles and a really great story! I totally recommend you all download the alpha and check it out!
